A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was so frustrated after the first viewing.  I went home and watched all the negative reviews and I totally understand where they are coming from\, but after the second viewing I picked up SOOO much more that I didn't get from the first viewing.  This is a rich\, dense film that has a lot more to it than meets the eye.  I absolutely love this film.  Don't think yourself out of enjoying this amazing film.  Yeah\, there are a few plot holes\, a few miracles of physics\, and some really cheesy prequelesque moments that really distracted\, but all of that seemed so much less distracting on the second pass.  In addition to that\, I got so much more out of the dialogue that I missed the first time that really helped make a lot more sense of this film and made me see that this film isn't as \"all over the place\" as it seems at first.  There is a clear direction and purpose throughout that just isn't super obvious at first.  If you're like me and didn't enjoy this movie at all the first time\, do yourself a favor and watch it a second time before you really make up your mind.  This film was so much fun!!!
